resources:
Asebter-a d win yerzan imdannen yebɣan ad aɣ-d-yefken afus n tallelt.
Akken tεelmmem, leqdic-a "Tamusni n teqbaylit" d allal yettwaxdem s ttawilat-nneɣ. Deg yeswi n uzuzer n tussna n teqbaylit i yemdannen ur nesεi ara tagnit i waya, ama deg uɣarbaz neɣ berra i uḥric-a.
D acu ara ibedllen ma nefka-d afud i usenfar-a ? Amhaz n leqdic "Tamusni n teqbaylit" tessiskkin-awen-d aṭas n twuriwin ɣef waya ad tawali-m ruḥent-d tiseddarin ddew :
1- asnarni n yinzan d yemdannen yettwasnnen.
2- ameslay (ad awen-efk tagnit ad tmeslayem zdaxel-is).
3-asnarni n tqesiḍin xarsum "timucuha".
4-asnerni n twelafin
5- ad nernu ɣer waya amaṭaf n radyu.
Amek ara aɣ-t-εawenem ? S lmendad-nneɣ llant waṭas Amek I Tzemrem iwakken ad aɣ-d-efkem afus n tallelt.
#Mode Payement
-Tazmert tamenzut (1) iwakken ad tεawnem ttawil-a deg tama yelha i wid yebɣan ad εawnnen akked wid i qedcen deg-s. S lbiε deg tszenzut-nneɣ tiɣawsiwin i izemren ad ken-yawin
-Tazmert tamenzut (1) iwakken ad tεawnem ttawil-a deg tama yelha i wid yebɣan ad εawnnen akked wid i qedcen deg-s. S lbiε deg tszenzut-nneɣ tiɣawsiwin i izemren ad ken-yawin
lwelhi :
BOUTIQUE-KABYLE.ORG
-Tazmert tis snat (2) iwakken ad fkem afus n tallelt i ttawil-nneɣ anmetti d tin akk isahlen, d azuzer d ussissen n wayen nqeddec deg tawilat-nwen deg uzeṭṭa anemtti n yal yiwen deg-wen.
Agraw-Naɣ :
TARWA NDA LOUNES.
